events.description: Emitted when the cancel button is clicked

events.name: change
events.description: Emitted when current option is changed

attributes.name: main-active-index
attributes.description: The index of selected parent node

events.name: click-nav
events.description: Emitted when parent node is selected

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Input name, usually a unique string or number

attributes.name: preview-full-image
attributes.description: Whether to show full screen image preview when image is clicked

attributes.name: preview-options
attributes.description: Options of full screen image preview, see [ImagePreview](#/en-US/image-preview)

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Whether to enable multiple selection pictures

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Whether to make upload area readonly

attributes.name: lazy-load
attributes.description: Whether to enable lazy load, should register [Lazyload](#/en-US/lazyload) component

attributes.name: before-read
attributes.description: Hook before reading the file, return false to stop reading the file, can return Promise

attributes.name: before-delete
attributes.description: Hook before delete the file, return false to stop reading the file, can return Promise

attributes.name: result-type
attributes.description: Type of file read result, can be set to `file` `text`

events.name: oversize
events.description: Emitted when file size over limit

events.name: click-preview
events.description: Emitted when preview image is clicked

events.name: close-preview
events.description: Emitted when the full screen image preview is closed

events.name: delete
events.description: Emitted when preview file is deleted

slots.name: preview-cover
slots.description: Custom content that covers the image preview
